Key Match Events: Kohli hits 82 not out to help India win by 4 wickets
Nawaz dismisses Dinesh Karthik with the game on the line
Shaheen Afridi hits a flat six at the MCG
Pre-Game Insights: India win the toss and will bowl
Analysts predicted a close game between the two rival teams
The manager emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit expresses pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Kohli thanks the crowd for keeping him going
Babar praises Hardik Pandya and Virat Kohli for shifting the momentum
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain delays led to the game being postponed until the next day
The game went into 15 innings before a decisive home run by Mike Trout
Others: The match was played in front of 90,293 fans
This was the 100th meeting between the two teams
